original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: A Royal Pony Wedding
overview: It's the moment everypony in Equestria has been waiting for: the royal wedding of Princess Cadence and her dashing groom, Shining Armor. But before they get to the altar, the ponies must take care of some other problems including dealing with unfounded gossip, finding out who has been secretly eating delicious desserts and creating a tornado to move water from their reservoir.
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: A Royal Pony Wedding
